params.name: all_masks
params.description: List of all predicted segmentation masks

params.name: all_scores
params.description: List of all predicted iou scores

params.name: all_boxes
params.description: List of all bounding boxes of the predicted masks

params.name: crops_nms_thresh
params.description: Threshold for NMS (Non Maximum Suppression) algorithm.

params.name: return_tensors
params.description: If pt, returns torch.Tensor. If tf, returns tf.Tensor.
